author: costin
msg: Renamed to follow the same naming scheme with the rest of the code.

author: costin
msg: Renamed the ajp worker to follow the rest of the code naming scheme.
Also reverted back to ajp13 - all 14 extensions will consist on
additional headers, the protocol is backward compatible.

author: billbarker
msg: Connector support for the new MaxKeepAliveRequests attribute.

author: billbarker
msg: Add support for MaxKeepAliveRequests like in Apache httpd.

This is primarily a protection against DoS attacks.  With this enabled, we eventually gracefully drop a Keep-Alive connection for greedy clients.  By default, this is currently disabled (so no change in the behavior).  It needs to be set by the Adaptor to have any effect.

author: remm
msg: - Switch over to the optimized j-t-c/util code for cookie parsing.
